授業方法: This class will be conducted entirely in English. Students will engage extensively in group and pair work. Google Docs will be utilized to allow for easy collaboration. Each class will have a discussion component, and students will work towards preparing presentations while writing academic research papers.

第1回: Course introduction and discussion of teacher’s expectations.
第2回: Topic: Choosing and refining topics for academic research papers.
第3回: Topic: Introduction to academic paragraph writing.
Locating first two sources and writing first summary/analysis for bibliography (approx. 2 hours).
第4回: Topic: Finding sources for academic papers.
Locating two more sources and writing second summary/analysis for bibliography (approx. 2 hours).
第5回: Refining and revising annotated bibliography (approx. 2 hours).
第6回: Presentation design and skills workshop I; Annotated bibliography due.
第7回: Presentation one: student research topic introduction.
第8回: First paragraph of essay due (approx. 2 hours).
第9回: Body of essay to be completed (approx. 2 hours).
第11回: Peer review of other students' writing due (approx. 2 hours).
第12回: Topic: Presentation design and skills workshop II.
Group A submits second draft for teacher review; Group B submits presentation slides (approx. 2 hours).
第13回: Group A submits presentation slides; Group B submits second draft for teacher review (approx. 2 hours).
第14回: Final presentations (ctd); Final draft of research paper due; Course reflection and discussion.
